text_block_list.text: [Dummy Text]

text_block_list.name: TV Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's the last 200 meters! The mighty Hishi Amazon is in hot pursuit of 
the lead! Narita Brian's struggling in the stretch!

Following the Tenno Sho (Autumn), Narita Brian faces defeat in the 
Japan Cup as well.

Her win streak felt like it could have gone on forever… I wonder what 
happened as I watch videos of the races to find a clue.

Following the agenda, the next race'll be the Arima Kinen. There must 
be some hint for getting her previous strength back.

text_block_list.name: TV Caster
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon finishes in a close second! Narita Brian's fallen behind 
and finishes sixth!

I can see she's not drawing out all her energy. And her low stance 
from before…

I can see she's not drawing out all her energy. And her low stance 
from before…
Knock, knock!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry to barge in.
Oh, a visit from you is rare.
Oh, a visit from you is rare.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, well, you're looking after my sister, and I want to speak to you 
about her.

Though she sounds relaxed, there's concern in her expression. She 
must be more worried about Brian than anyone.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The gossip going around is that her injury hasn't fully healed yet…
That's just a rumor. Even judging by her running, she's recovered.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
As I suspected. I can't imagine you would let her overexert herself, 
but her results aren't improving.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Faced by that fact, do you still intend for her to run in the Arima 
Kinen?
As long as Brian wants it, I'm going to respect her wishes.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Even though you don't know what's causing the problem?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
If she were to lose again in the Arima Kinen, your guidance could be 
called into question. You'll have her run knowing that?
That's definitely a real possibility. But I don't care.
choice_data_list: I'm just putting Brian's decision above all else.
I'm just putting Brian's decision above all else.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Chuckle… Good, that's a relief to hear.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: To be honest, I came here to request that she run in the Arima Kinen.
You did?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I see that wasn't necessary. You have what's best for your 
racers—for Brian—in mind.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'd like to say one thing though. It's about the time she lost the Tenno 
Sho (Autumn).

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I was surprised too when she placed twelfth. Afterward I went to see 
her…
She was crying?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We're sisters, but I don't remember the last time I saw tears streaming 
down her face.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Racing isn't something she'd ever quit easily.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: So I hope you do everything you can to help her… Please.
Hayahide may already understand what's happened to Brian.

Deep in her eyes, I see a sister's love. It's clear she's putting a lot of 
faith in me to help her younger sibling.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huff… Puff…
It's past hours, Brian. The track's closed.
It's past hours, Brian. The track's closed.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The Arima Kinen's almost here, so just give it to me straight.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Are you here… to tell me to stop training?
No, I came to see how you're doing.
No, I came to see how you're doing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: How I'm doing?

I heard from Hayahide about what happened after the Tenno Sho 
(Autumn).
I don't know enough to understand why you were crying.
I don't know enough to understand why you were crying.
But I know that the Tenno Sho (Autumn) was a big deal for you.
But I know that the Tenno Sho (Autumn) was a big deal for you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I see. So you came to check up on me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: What now? Are you going to tell me to call off the Arima Kinen?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I cried after losing a race… You think such a pitiful excuse of a racer 
has no right entering the Grand Prix?!
Brian glares at me with piercing eyes, almost growling out the words.
When I see that glimmer in her gaze, I become sure of it.
choice_data_list:
When I see that glimmer in her gaze, I become 
sure of it.
No, you're running in the Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: No, you're running in the Arima Kinen.
choice_data_list:
I'm starting to get why you cried then. Your will 
can't be bent.

text_block_list.text: I'm starting to get why you cried then. Your will can't be bent.
So I'm going to let you run wild. A trainer's there to support his racers.

So I'm going to let you run wild. A trainer's there to support her 
racers.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huh…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I shouldn't have doubted you. So… thank you.

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: Win this one, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: Win this one, Brian!
choice_data_list: Right, time to pull out all the stops!

I don't know why Brian can't get back to 
normal, and I don't know what brought her to 
tears either.

text_block_list.text:
But even so, I believe in her. Because in that look of hers, I see only 
determination.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian holds an ideal spot as she enters the stretch! Will this 
finally be her day?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's impeccable positioning! All that's left is to charge ahead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In the lead is the winner of the Kikuka Sho, Mayano Top Gun! Narita 
Brian's fiercely chasing behind!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Go, Brian! Give us that good ol' sprint we know and love!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But it looks like she's struggling! Where's that raw power Brian is 
famous for?
Brian soon runs past me, and her expression comes into clear view.
She's running as if clawing at the ground in pure desperation.

But she's unable to reach even the shadow of Mayano Top Gun, and 
her opponents soon catch up from behind.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: It's no use, she won't make it!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: She used to be the strongest, but now she's…

Her gaze never falters though. She hungers for victory, never losing 
sight of the finish line.
As I watch her frantic attempt, I finally understand.

Her losing streak isn't because of the injury. She's unable to command 
the run she once so skillfully wielded.

She must've realized this during the Tenno Sho (Autumn). That 
feeling of hopelessness must've been what brought her to tears.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian can't shorten the gap! Mayano Top Gun is unchallenged!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!
But she continues on—she always pushes forward.
The moment I see this, the words come welling up out of me.

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: You can do it, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: …C'mon, Briaaan!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Mayano Top Gun wins the race! With the momentum from her 
Kikuka Sho victory, she's won the Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian can't hold out and finishes fourth!

I used to praise her boundless strength, but this might be the first 
time I shouted to encourage her.

Though the results weren't what we hoped, I feel like we made 
progress—she as a runner, and I as her trainer.

She'll never stop running toward victory. That's what makes her the 
strongest.

それでもようやく、彼女のトレーナーである自分 も 
前に進めた気がした。

ただひたすらに勝利へ向かって走り続ける、ナリ タブライアン。 
だから、彼女は間違いなく今でも最強のウマ娘だ… …！
